name: cordova-plugin-appsflyer
description: Cordova plugin for integration with AppsFlyer SDK. It's a fork with some changes of the official version from AppsFlyer.
author: DevDmitryHub

scripts.jshint: node node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint www && node node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint src && node node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint tests
scripts.preparedemo: cd examples/demoA; cordova plugin rm com.appsflyer.phonegap.plugins.appsflyer --save; cordova plugin add ../.. --save
scripts.setup: cd examples/demoA; npm install; cd ../..; npm run preparedemo;
